synopsis.text: Goldfish Flowers, tortured souls, and a touch of the sadistic - welcome to the underworld's bureaucracy, where Hoozuki, the calm and collected demon, keeps the gears turning. As the right-hand to King Enma, the ruler of the Japanese Hell, Hoozuki is tasked with managing the 272 subdivisions and resolving the myriad problems that arise, from unruly employees to diplomatic visits from other underworlds. But don't let his love for cute animals and gardening fool you - Hoozuki's mile-wide sadistic streak ensures that even the Great King Enma himself stays in line. With a heavy workload and a staff shortage, Hoozuki must use his negotiation skills and iron will to keep the afterlife running smoothly. Join Hoozuki as he navigates the challenges of managing Hell in this dark comedy that brings a new perspective to the phrase "employer liability."
